author: sisbell
msg: Fixed broken unit tests and added method for being able to tell which model and artifactmetadata dependency came from.

author: ate
msg: JS2-871 - Upgrade Pluto container to version 2.0
- fixing most (not all yet) API alignment issues with the aggregator/impl package

author: assaf
msg: Rolling back to RSpec 1.1.8.  1.1.9 uses runtime/dev dependencies, works nicely with RubyGems 1.3 but brings too much baggage with 1.2.

author: jgomes
msg: Added checks to nant.build to skip a build if the Apache.NMS assembly for the current build framework is not available.  Fixed references to NUnit assemblies.
